action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10+1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: The dragon exhales fire in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 24 (7d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.
